items.title: 日本海側で大雪 全国的に厳しい冷え込み 3連休に大雪 猛吹雪か
items.title_zh: 日本海边的大雪 连续三个节日 严重地浇入重雪
items.summary: 大雪「不要不急の外出控えて！」 何が危ない？その時どうする？
items.summary_zh: 大顺"不必要意外出局!" 什么危险? 我该怎么办?

items.title: 【ライブ】山梨 上野原で山林火災 9日朝から消火活動を再開
items.title_zh: [活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活
items.summary: 主食用米の生産量 新潟県や秋田県など 去年より抑える方針
items.summary_zh: 主要膳食的稻米产量,如新加塔县和秋田县

items.title: 国連事務総長 米の国際機関脱退で遺憾の意 分担金支払い求める
items.title_zh: 联合国秘书长
items.summary: トランプ大統領“66の国際機関・条約などから脱退や離脱指示”
items.summary_zh: 特朗普总统的"66个国际组织/公约"

items.title: シリア 暫定政府側とクルド人勢力が衝突 民間人10人以上死亡
items.title_zh: 叙利亚临时政府和联合部队与10名或10名以上平民交火
items.summary: トランプ政権 イスラエル・シリアの共同枠組み設置決定と発表
items.summary_zh: 特朗普政府的决定和以色列联合框架的宣布 叙利亚

items.title: 東京 大田区 男性殺害事件 室内に血のついた複数の足跡
items.title_zh: 东京Ota-ku 雄性杀人事件 房间里多处有血迹
items.summary: 【ライブ】山梨 上野原で山林火災 9日朝から消火活動を再開
items.summary_zh: [活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活

items.title: 群馬 太田 男性が首など刺され死亡 ベトナム国籍の容疑者逮捕
items.title_zh: Gunma Ota Male被刺杀,
items.summary: 【ライブ】山梨 上野原で山林火災 9日朝から消火活動を再開
items.summary_zh: [活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活活

items.title: 大阪 岸和田で車暴走“容疑者は当時 無免許運転” 捜査関係者
items.title_zh: 在大阪的Kishiwada汽车 运行"可疑的驾驶 当时没有执照" 调查员
items.summary: 大阪 岸和田 車暴走 警察官振り落として逃げたか 容疑者を逮捕
items.summary_zh: 大阪纪和田汽车出逃 成警察

items.title: Two starkly opposed Americas laid bare by deadly ICE shooting
items.title_zh: 两个强烈反对的美洲 赤裸裸的致命ICE枪击事件
items.summary: The fatal shooting of a woman in Minneapolis by a federal law-enforcement officer is laying bare the sharp divides in US politics – and threatening to inflame an already contentious debate over immigration policy.
items.summary_zh: 一名联邦执法人员在明尼阿波利斯对一名妇女的致命枪击正在揭开美国政治的尖锐鸿沟 — — 并有可能激起已经有争议的移民政策争论。

items.title: Bowen: Trump risks pushing world back to age of empires
items.title_zh: 博文:特朗普冒险把世界推回帝国时代
items.summary: Only a few hours after the Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro was removed from his palace, his job and his country by US special forces, Donald Trump was still marvelling about how it felt to monitor a live feed of the raid from his Mar-a-Lago mansion.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统马杜罗(Nicolas Maduro)被美国特种部队赶出宫殿、工作及国家仅几个小时后,

items.title: One million spent hours without heat and water after Russian strikes, Ukraine says
items.title_zh: 俄国罢工后,
items.summary: More than one million people in south-eastern Ukraine spent hours without heating and water supplies as a result of Russian air strikes, officials have said.
items.summary_zh: 官员们说,由于俄罗斯的空袭,乌克兰东南部有100多万人花费了几个小时没有取暖和供水。

items.title: Algeria apologises after player mocks Congolese superfan dressed as pan-African hero
items.title_zh: 阿尔及利亚在玩家嘲弄刚果超人打扮成泛非英雄后道歉.
items.summary: Algeria's football federation has apologised to a Congolese superfan who has become one of the stars of the Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) being held in Morocco.
items.summary_zh: 阿尔及利亚足球联合会向一位成为摩洛哥举行的非洲国家杯(Afcon)明星之一的刚果超人道歉.

items.title: US involvement in Venezuela could last years, Trump says
items.title_zh: 特朗普说,美国对委内瑞拉的参与可能持续多年
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has said that his country's involvement in Venezuela could last for years.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示,他的国家参与委内瑞拉事务可能持续多年.

items.title: Saudi-led coalition says UAE helped smuggle separatist leader out of Yemen
items.title_zh: 沙特领导的联盟说阿联酋帮助将分裂主义领导人偷运出也门
items.summary: The Saudi-led coalition in Yemen has alleged the United Arab Emirates helped smuggle a separatist leader out of the country after he was expelled from Yemen's presidential council and accused of treason.
items.summary_zh: 以沙特为首的也门联盟指控阿联酋在一名分裂主义领导人被也门总统委员会驱逐并被指叛国后,帮助将他偷运出也门.

items.title: Tennis Kenya admits it shouldn't have let amateur compete after viral defeat
items.title_zh: 肯尼亚网球队承认,它不应该让业余选手在病毒被击败后参加比赛.
items.summary: The organisers of a professional women's tournament which has gone viral on social media because of a wildcard player's dire performance have acknowledged she should not have been allowed to play.
items.summary_zh: 一个职业女子锦标赛的举办者因为一名通卡选手的糟糕表现,在社交媒体上病毒化了,他们承认她不应该被允许参赛。

items.title: Watch: Eyewitnesses recount deadly ICE shooting
items.title_zh: 观察:目击证人讲述了致命的ICE枪击事件
items.summary: Eyewitnesses recount the moments a deadly ICE shooting unfolded in Minneapolis, Minnesota, describing what led up to the incident and what happened after. Renee Nicole Good, 37, was shot and pronounced dead after being transported to the hospital.
items.summary_zh: 目击者讲述了在明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯发生的一起致命的ICE枪击事件,描述了导致事件的原因和之后发生的事情. 蕾妮·妮可·古德 37岁被送往医院后被枪决并宣告死亡.

items.title: Trump withdraws US from key climate treaty and dozens of other groups
items.title_zh: 特朗普将美国退出关键气候条约和其他数十个集团
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has withdrawn the US from dozens of international organisations, including many that work to combat climate change.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普将美国撤出了数十个国际组织,包括许多致力于应对气候变化的组织.

items.title: US halts assistance to Somalia over claims food aid was illegally seized
items.title_zh: 美国停止对索马里的援助 声称粮食援助被非法扣押
items.summary: The US has suspended all assistance to the government of Somalia, alleging that officials destroyed a UN World Food Programme (WFP) warehouse and seized "donor-funded food aid".
items.summary_zh: 美国暂停了对索马里政府的一切援助,指控官员摧毁了联合国世界粮食计划署(粮食计划署)的一个仓库并没收了"捐助者资助的粮食援助".

items.title: Who was Renee Nicole Good, the woman killed by ICE?
items.title_zh: 被ICE杀害的女人蕾妮·妮可·古德是谁?
items.summary: The woman shot dead by a federal immigration agent in Minneapolis has been identified as Renee Nicole Good, a 37-year-old mother of three who had just moved to the city.
items.summary_zh: 被明尼阿波利斯联邦移民特工射杀的女子被确认为雷妮·妮可·古德(Renee Nicole Good),她37岁,母亲是刚搬入城市的3人.

items.title: Lebanese army says it has taken over security in Hezbollah-dominated south
items.title_zh: 黎巴嫩军队已经占领了真主党控制的南部的安全
items.summary: The Lebanese army says it has taken over security in the south of the country, which for decades had been dominated by the Iranian-backed movement Hezbollah, amid fears that Israel could escalate its military offensive against the group.
items.summary_zh: 黎巴嫩军队说,它接管了该国南部的安全,几十年来,该地区一直由伊朗支持的真主党运动所控制,因为担心以色列会加剧对该组织的军事进攻。

items.title: Spain's Catholic Church signs deal on sexual abuse compensation
items.title_zh: 西班牙天主教会关于性虐待赔偿的协议
items.summary: Spain's Roman Catholic Church has reached an agreement with the government to compensate victims of sexual abuse by members of the clergy.
items.summary_zh: 西班牙罗马天主教会与政府达成协议,赔偿受神职人员性虐待的受害者.

items.title: Vance criticises Denmark and Europe's handling of 'critical' Greenland
items.title_zh: Vance批评丹麦和欧洲对格陵兰的处理方式
items.summary: US Vice-President JD Vance says Greenland is "critical" for the defence of the US and the world against possible Russian or Chinese missile attacks - and that Europe and Denmark have "not done a good job" in securing the area.
items.summary_zh: 美国副总统旺斯(JD Vance)表示,格陵兰对于美国和世界防御可能发生的俄罗斯或中国导弹袭击是"关键"的——欧洲和丹麦在保障该地区安全方面"没有做任何好的工作".

items.title: Influential China church reports arrests as crackdown on Christians intensifies
items.title_zh: 有影响力的中国教会报告说,逮捕是对基督教徒的镇压,加大了力度。
items.summary: An influential Protestant church in China says prominent leaders have been arrested in what appears to be a growing crackdown on the underground church movement.
items.summary_zh: 中国有影响力的一所新教教会说,著名领袖在似乎日益镇压地下教会运动中被逮捕.

items.title: Inside the sub-zero lair of the world's most powerful computer
items.title_zh: 在世界上最强大的电脑的零下巢穴里
items.summary: It looks like a golden chandelier and contains the coldest place in the known universe.
items.summary_zh: 它看起来像个金色的吊灯 里面有已知宇宙中最冷的地方

items.title: Australia PM announces royal commission into Bondi shooting
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚首相宣布 皇家委员会进入邦迪枪击案
items.summary: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a royal commission, the country's most powerful form of independent inquiry, into last month's shooting at Bondi Beach.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞(Anthony Albanese)宣布成立一个皇家委员会,这是该国最强大的独立调查形式,调查上个月邦迪海滩被枪击事件.

items.title: Analysis: Why Trump chose Maduro's VP over Nobel winner
items.title_zh: 分析:为什么特朗普选择马杜罗的VP胜过诺贝尔奖得主.
items.summary: Amid the many questions swirling since last weekend's dramatic events in Caracas – and there are many – one that refuses to go away centres on the bespectacled woman now leading what US officials are calling Venezuela's "interim authorities".
items.summary_zh: 上个周末加拉加斯发生戏剧性事件后,

items.title: Heatwave hits Australia as officials warn of 'catastrophic' fire risk
items.title_zh: 热浪袭击澳洲,
items.summary: Parts of Australia will face catastrophic fire conditions on Friday, when heatwaves are expected to hit most of the country.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚部分地区将在星期五面临灾难性的火灾条件,预计届时热浪会袭击该国大部分地区.

items.title: How tariff disruption will continue reshaping the global economy in 2026
items.title_zh: 关税中断如何在2026年继续重塑全球经济
items.summary: President Trump's favourite word is tariffs. He reminded the world of that in his pre-Christmas "address to the nation".
items.summary_zh: 川普总统最喜欢的词是关税. 他在圣诞节前的"对全国的讲话"中提醒了世界这一点.

items.title: 'We are not for sale': Greenlanders express fear and indignation as Trump eyes territory
items.title_zh: "我们不卖": 格陵兰人表达恐惧和愤慨,
items.summary: "The people of Greenland do not want to become American," Mia Chemnitz tells the BBC. "We are not for sale."
items.summary_zh: "格陵兰人民不想成为美国人",米娅·切姆尼茨告诉了英国广播公司. "我们不卖"

items.title: Video shows moment US immigration agent fatally shoots woman
items.title_zh: 视频显示,片刻 美国移民特工 致命地射杀女性
items.summary: A woman in a car was shot and killed by a US immigration officer on a residential street in Minnesota.
items.summary_zh: 在明尼苏达的一条住宅街上,一辆汽车上的一名妇女被一名美国移民官员开枪打死.

items.title: Tracking the oil tankers seized by the US
items.title_zh: 追踪被美国扣押的油轮
items.summary: BBC Verify has been tracking the Marinera for weeks. Merlyn Thomas has more.
items.summary_zh: BBC的核查 已经追踪Marinera数周了 梅林·托马斯还有更多

items.title: Watch: Trump says Maduro copied his dancing. Did he?
items.title_zh: 央视:特朗普称马杜罗复制了自己的舞蹈. 是吗?
items.summary: In a speech to Republican members of Congress at the Kennedy Center, Trump claimed that former Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro imitated his dance moves.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普在肯尼迪中心对共和党国会议员的演讲中称,委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗模仿了自己的舞蹈动作.

items.title: What's the relationship between Venezuela and Cuba?
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉与古巴的关系如何?.
items.summary: Cuba has held close relations with Nicolás Maduro's Venezuela. But with Maduro gone after a military operation in which he was seized, Havana could be exposed if oil supply collapses.
items.summary_zh: 古巴与尼古拉斯·马杜罗的委内瑞拉保持了密切关系. 但随着马杜罗在一次被扣押的军事行动后离去,如果石油供应崩溃,哈瓦那可能会被暴露.

items.title: Does the US have the right to take over Greenland?
items.title_zh: 美国是否有权接管格陵兰?
